name: Crazy: Fire Fly
description:
Crazy Fire Fly is Totally New Concept in Gaming World.

Crazy Fire Fly is Totally Unique Game For all Game Lover.A strategic wildfire Strategic game! Use your Mind to drop star on the spreading fire.Protect From Red Star from the blazing wildfire.

- Move a Circle into a screen to get High score
- you can play with Different Level
- Collect a Yellow and Red star
- Yellow star are Decrease your size
- Each level Easy to Hard Move.

FEATURES: 
************* 
✔ Move your Yellow Circle in Screen To get Point
✔ Different Unique Level
✔ Each Level Move into Hard
✔ There are 2 main star to get you Best 
✔ Red resources to build powerful you.!
✔ Massively you can Get with Power Button and High your Score! 
✔ Battle with that Rope and Go to For that Rope! 
✔ Experience gorgeous graphics and a rich storyline. 
✔ Dynamic and numerous mission system 
✔ Get real time updates 
✔ Real time Playing. 
✔ and much, much more! 

============ Unique Feature ========

-* Great Graphics
-* cool sound
-* Hard to get 100 score
-* Easily share
-* Get a Easy to hard
